content.en: Geological classification: Machine learning algorithms are being used to classify and predict various geological features in different deposits, such as alteration facies, lithostratigraphic units, and lithofacies. These algorithms, including unsupervised and supervised machine learning techniques, multivariate classification algorithms, and artificial neural networks, are able to analyze geochemical variables, geophysical data, and well logs to accurately identify and classify different rock types and deposit types. By integrating geological features and expert knowledge into machine learning classifiers, these algorithms are improving the effectiveness and accuracy of lithology classification in various geological formations.
content.da: Geologisk klassifikation: Maskinlæringsalgoritmer bliver brugt til at klassificere og forudsige forskellige geologiske træk i forskellige forekomster, såsom alterationsfacies, lithostratigrafiske enheder og litofacies. Disse algoritmer, herunder usuperviseret og superviseret maskinlæringsteknikker, multivariate klassifikationsalgoritmer og kunstige neurale netværk, er i stand til at analysere geokemiske variable, geofysiske data og borelogs for nøjagtigt at identificere og klassificere forskellige bjergartstyper og forekomsttyper. Ved at integrere geologiske træk og ekspertviden i maskinlæringsklassifikatorer forbedrer disse algoritmer effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af lithologiklassifikation i forskellige geologiske formationer.
